alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 1:05AM CDT until May 31 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 105 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Lipscomb, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Shattuck, Arnett, and Gage. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
